feed.title: Soirée, a night of fabulous music

entry.title: The Final Group is ... Topology
entry.summary: We are very proud to announce that the final group joining the program for the 2022 Soirée are Topology, established leaders in musical creativity in Australia, prolific creators of new original work, expert collaborators across genres and art forms and award-winning music educators. Topology are…
entry.content:
We are very proud to announce that the final group joining the program for the 2022 Soirée are Topology, established leaders in musical creativity in Australia, prolific creators of new original work, expert collaborators across genres and art forms and award-winning music educators.

Topology are famous for the breadth and depth of their collaborations. Undaunted by stylistic barriers, the quintet has created stunning new work with partners in theatre (Geoffrey Rush, Neil Armfield, Queensland Theatre Company), classical music (the Brodsky Quartet, the Southern Cross Soloists), contemporary art music (Terry Riley, Speak Percussion), dance (Expressions Dance Company, Heidi Duckler Dance Theatre, Jody Oberfelder), puppetry (Dead Puppet Society), contemporary jazz (Trichotomy, Loops), popular songwriting (Kate Miller-Heidke, Katie Noonan), comedy (the Kransky Sisters, Gerry Connolly), Asian music (Dheeraj Shrestha, Ubiet) and indigenous Australian music (William Barton).

Make sure to grab your tickets now to catch Topology, The Vocalise Duo, Aliya Grace, Bluesuits Quartet, Tessitura Acapella and Viridian Quartet at the Soirée on Saturday 4th June.

See you at the Soirée!

entry.title: Artists for 2022
entry.summary: The tickets are on sale, but we bet you would like to know who is performing. We can answer that now, as we are revealing the artists who will be performing at the 2022 Soirée, making it a night of fabulous music that is not…
entry.content:
The tickets are on sale, but we bet you would like to know who is performing. We can answer that now, as we are revealing the artists who will be performing at the 2022 Soirée, making it a night of fabulous music that is not to be missed.

Tessitura Acapella will be performing again after a great reception from last year's event. The local acapella group have been audience favourites at the Soirée for a few years now with their complex vocal harmonies injecting new life to well-known tunes.

The Vocalise Duo will also be returning from last year's event, bringing back their exquisite cello and piano sounds to take the audience with them on a journey through the opening movement of Édouard Lalo's Cello Concerto in D minor.

Bluesuits Quartet is a small group jazz ensemble formed in 2021 after playing together in the rhythm section of their high school band. They will be performing compositions by artists such as Miles Davis and the fusion collective Vulfpeck.

Aliya Grace, a former student of The Gap State School who began her journey in music in the instrumental music program, will be performing some original pieces and covers on guitar.

Viridian Quartet, formed in 2021 by a group of dedicated string players from the University of Queensland with significant solo, chamber and orchestral experience, will be joined by an outstanding pianist to perform Dvorak's Piano Quintet Op. 81.

There is one more group that will be announced very soon that will complete the program.

Grab your tickets now to hear these great performances at the Soirée on Saturday 4th June at The Gap State School MPB. Doors open at 5:30pm, enjoy a drink and some food, and browse the art gallery before the show starts at 6:30pm.

See you at the Soirée!

entry.title: 2022 Tickets Now Available
entry.summary: Tickets are now available for the 2022 Soirée, which is guaranteed to be another night of fabulous music! Head over to the Tickets page to secure your seats at the new lower price of $20. Also remember to like and follow the Facebook page to…
entry.content:
Tickets are now available for the 2022 Soirée, which is guaranteed to be another night of fabulous music! Head over to the Tickets page to secure your seats at the new lower price of $20. Also remember to like and follow the Facebook page to see artist announcements as they are released.

With a couple of groups returning from the successful 2021 Soirée along with a bunch of new musicians, the night will have something for everyone with a fresh variety of musical styles. Artist announcements will happen over the coming weeks. Also returning is the art gallery, the beer and wine, the food, and of course the fantastic atmosphere.

So come along, bring your family, friends and neighbours, and join other members of the community to enjoy a night of fabulous music and great company. Help to support local musicians and also the instrumental and choral programs at The Gap State School.

Grab your tickets, and we'll see you at the Soirée!

entry.title: Flashback to 2021
entry.summary: Preparations for the 2022 Soirée on Saturday 4th June are now underway. We almost have a full program of musicians ready to perform, and it is going to be another fabulous show. In the lead up to the next Soirée, we have posted a gallery…
entry.content:
Preparations for the 2022 Soirée on Saturday 4th June are now underway. We almost have a full program of musicians ready to perform, and it is going to be another fabulous show.

In the lead up to the next Soirée, we have posted a gallery of photos from the last event. Many great memories from a fantastic night if you were there, and if you weren't it is a good preview of what you will see when you come to the next one. Who was your favourite act?

Enjoy the gallery of the last Soirée, and we will see you at the next Soirée!

entry.title: The Next Soirée?
entry.summary: After a bit of downtime to recover from the Soirée of 2021, we are now back with planning for the 2022 event. When will that be, we hear you ask. We have booked in Saturday 4th June, 2022 for the next Soirée. That time in…
entry.content:
After a bit of downtime to recover from the Soirée of 2021, we are now back with planning for the 2022 event. When will that be, we hear you ask.

We have booked in Saturday 4th June, 2022 for the next Soirée. That time in the third quarter of the year was quite busy for many people, and looking ahead it appears it will be similar again. So we made the decision to move it a bit earlier in the year. It will be bigger and better, with another collection of local musicians and groups to entertain. There will be beer and wine. There will be more glorious food. There will be another beautiful art gallery. And of course there will be you, our wonderful patrons to enjoy the night. There will be more announcements in early 2022, so keep in touch for all the updates.

If you have a business and would be interested in sponsoring the Soirée in 2022, please contact us. There are many costs to run an event such as this, and sponsorship helps us to provide the tickets at a reasonable price.

See you at the next Soirée!

entry.title: That is a Wrap!
entry.summary: And that is a wrap for another night of fabulous music at the Soirée. It was a long day, setting up, the event, then cleaning up, my body was aching and sore, but it was a fantastic night and I loved every minute of…
entry.content:
And that is a wrap for another night of fabulous music at the Soirée. It was a long day, setting up, the event, then cleaning up, my body was aching and sore, but it was a fantastic night and I loved every minute of it.
 
Thank you to all of the volunteers who helped with the night. You made this night run smoothly and it was a pleasure to watch everything happen.
 
Thank you to the sponsors. Concept Carpentry and Ray White The Gap. Cr Steven Toomey and the Lord Mayor's Community Fund. Jonty Bush - Member for Cooper and all of the businesses that donated prizes for the raffles.
 
Thank you to all of the performers who played for us. It was indeed some fabulous music, and we loved listening to it. Thank you for sharing it with us, including the senior instrumental students from The Gap State School and the String Quartet from The Gap State High School, the school that also provided the wonderful visual art displays.
 
And thank you to everyone who attended the night. It is you that make this night possible. Seeing everyone enjoying a great night out is what drives us to do this.
See you at the next Soirée!

entry.title: Thank You To Our Sponsors
entry.summary: Without the gracious support of our sponsors, whether it be financial to help cover the cost of putting on an event or through donations, the Soirée would not be possible. Please consider supporting these local businesses and individuals that help us to provide live music…
entry.content:
Without the gracious support of our sponsors, whether it be financial to help cover the cost of putting on an event or through donations, the Soirée would not be possible. Please consider supporting these local businesses and individuals that help us to provide live music events in our community.

Concept Carpentry

 Ray White The Gap
Queensland Art Gallery | Gallery of Modern Art

 Red Hill Cinemas
Bardon Bowls Club

 Allsports Physiotherapy & Sports Medicine

Guitar Brothers

 The Gap Ward Cr Steven Toomey

 

Jonty Bush MP

entry.title: It's Getting Exciting
entry.summary: With just over a week to go until the Soirée, a night of fabulous music, is upon us, the excitement is building. The musicians are rehearsing their sets, the decor is being arranged, the bar is being stocked, and tickets are being sold. There are…
entry.content:
With just over a week to go until the Soirée, a night of fabulous music, is upon us, the excitement is building. The musicians are rehearsing their sets, the decor is being arranged, the bar is being stocked, and tickets are being sold. There are still good tickets available, so get in soon to lock in yours for family and friends.

Start the night off with a drink from the bar and view the art display from students at The Gap State High School, with music provided by selected senior instrumental music students from The Gap State School.

During the interval, the String Quartet from The Gap State High School will perform in the foyer near the art display while you enjoy another drink from the bar.

The music will delight, with cello and piano by The Vocalise Duo, Australian, Scandinavian and UK folk music by Brisbane Folk Quartet, and a mix of classical and jazz trumpet and flugelhorn with piano by Duo Key. The guitar and vocals of Slade Gibson and Melissa Gill will draw you in, the vocal harmony of Tessitura Acapella will carry you along to the eclectic and diverse original repertoire of MINT.

So get in quick to secure your tickets, and we will see you at the Soirée!

entry.title: Three Weeks To Go
entry.summary: It is now only three more weeks until the Soirée, a night of fabulous music in The Gap with fantastic groups of local musicians performing on Saturday 11th September. Tickets are now available, so make sure to book soon to get the seats of your…
entry.content:
It is now only three more weeks until the Soirée, a night of fabulous music in The Gap with fantastic groups of local musicians performing on Saturday 11th September. Tickets are now available, so make sure to book soon to get the seats of your choice.

Queenslanders really came together in the last few weeks to help keep community spread from the recent COVID outbreaks down to a minimum, and the results have spoken for themselves. Restrictions are now beginning to ease, so we are still confident that the Soirée will not be impacted. We were already following Qld Health's advice on being COVID Safe, and continue to monitor the latest advice. The ticketing is for allocated seating to keep in line with this advice, and we have also enabled a feature that the ticketing service provides of automatically blocking a seat between separate bookings. This will help to maintain social distancing between groups of attendees while seated. It won't allow us to get to 100% capacity (that would be a nice problem to have), but will help to keep some people more comfortable about being in an indoor venue at this time.

Masks will still likely be mandatory while indoors, and if that is the case we will be requiring the use of masks while in the venue. Even if these restrictions are relaxed before then, we would still encourage the use of masks.

So come out on Saturday 11th September to celebrate local music and catch up with friends, family and neighbours.

See you at the Soirée!

entry.title: Soirée Tickets Now Available
entry.summary: This is most exciting! Tickets for Soirée, a night of fabulous music, are now available! Tell your friends and family, get them along, and also share on your social media. Entry is $25 with a bar and light refreshments available. Doors open at 6pm, and…
entry.content:
This is most exciting! Tickets for Soirée, a night of fabulous music, are now available! Tell your friends and family, get them along, and also share on your social media.

Entry is $25 with a bar and light refreshments available. Doors open at 6pm, and the performance starts at 7pm. Seating is allocated, so get in early to select your preferred seats.

You can also read more about the wonderful and talented artists that we have performing on the night.

  • Slade Gibson and Melissa Gill
  • Tessitura Acapella
  • The Vocalise Duo
  • Brisbane Folk Quartet
  • MINT
  • Duo Key

While you are waiting for the performances to begin, selected senior students from The Gap State School's instrumental music program will be playing in the foyer. During interval, the talented String Quartet from The Gap State High School will be performing for your listening pleasure.

This will be a COVID-safe event in compliance with Qld Health's guidelines. Check in with the Check In Qld app will be required before entry to the venue. If you do not have the app available to you, our volunteers will be able to assist you.

Grab those tickets for you, your family and your friends, and we'll see you at the Soirée!
